Field Detail

protocol

static final java.lang.String protocol
See Also:
Constant Field Values

serverName

static final java.lang.String serverName
the web host to contact. Preferably by https, but fallback to http if that fails.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

cacheRoot

static final java.lang.String cacheRoot
this is the root class expected to be present in the list of jars. It should contain the standard jar manifest that lists all the other classes.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

runClass

static final java.lang.String runClass
this is the runnable class that is actually run from the cache

See Also:
Constant Field Values

runArgs

static final java.lang.String[] runArgs
these args are passed to the runnable class as system properties.

webUrl

static final java.lang.String webUrl
this url will fetch the list of jars to be cached. For a simple enough application, it could be just a text file to be fetched, but the intended url would be a simple perl program.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

errorURL

static final java.lang.String errorURL
this url is a logging application, specically to log problems the end user has with this application. there's no other way you'll ever know!

See Also:
Constant Field Values
